
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(imager)
```

```{r}
filenames = base::list.files('images')
```

```{r}
couch_images = map(
  filenames,
    function(x) {
      load.image(
      paste0('images/', x)
    ) %>% 
        as.array()
  }
)
```


```{r}
keep_images = map_lgl(couch_images, function(x) dim(x)[[1]] == 1920)
```

```{r}
couch_images = couch_images[keep_images]
```


```{r}
plot(couch_images[[1]])
```
